messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Learning books, was Digest Number 1633
messages.msgSnippet: Is the book called 7 kinds of Smart ? Its by Thomas Armstrong, PH.D. A very good read! Especially if you want to learn how your children learn IMO. Indiana
messages.messageBody:
Is the book called "7 kinds of Smart"? Its by Thomas Armstrong, PH.D.
A very good read! Especially if you want to learn how your children learn
IMO.
Indiana Tami

"You must be the change you wish to see in the world"
~Ghandi

I think the author is Martin Gardner, or Gardener. Heï¿½s written several
books on that.

Elsa Haas


Also, have you read the book - can't think of the name - on seven types of
intelligence? Somebody here will know it - focus on her strengths, believe
in her....and let her know. And try to let go of *your* goals for her.
Wish you well,
Susan
